meanings.definition: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.
meanings.sent1: She was the happiest girl in the class.
meanings.sent2: The puppy looked happiest when playing with its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: The happiest moment of the day was when the sun finally came out after the rain.
meanings.sent4: His face lit up with the happiest smile when he saw his birthday cake.
meanings.sent5: The happiest memories are often the simplest ones, like watching the sunset.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or indicative of pleasure, contentment, or joy.
meanings.sent1: The happiest song on the radio always made her dance.
meanings.sent2: Their garden was the happiest place with colorful flowers blooming everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The happiest color in her wardrobe was always bright yellow.
meanings.sent4: The happiest day of the year for him was when the carnival came to town.
meanings.sent5: The happiest feeling in the world is knowing you are loved.
